column4: I had my laptop and office computer able to see each other and transfer files via file manager, I have since reinstalled Ubuntu on both machines and can not figure out how to get them to do that again. On both machines I installed openSSH, as they are connected via router
I can ping each one from the other
Open the filemanager, under its File menu, choose Connect to server, choose SSH as the connection type, fill in the rest
Remember to check the box to save a bookmark so you don't have to do it every time
